Description: $Port Carnelian -> ポート・カーネリアン$Increase this to 100 at the hidden workshop in Port Carnelian to convert your ship to a zubmarine.
LevelDescriptionText: $Extraordinary Implication -> 尋常ならざる示唆, Outlandish Art[ie]fact -> 風変わりな工芸品, Stygian Ivory -> 漆黒の象牙$1| You can trade Zee-Ztories, Stygian Ivory, Outlandish Artefacts, or Extraordinary Implications to increase this.
Name: Experimental Modifications
